column4: hey. I am looking for a software - if there is such - to be able to control, and if not to control at least to read, transfer data in a closed wifi network. I want to see and/or control how much data each computer transfers. Is that possilbe? my router is netgear rangemax next WNR834B. Any ideas?
you mean traffic shaping? like that? or just watching?
yes, I guessed flac will weight much.
